spiritsExplanation: The video titled "10 Min All-Out Elliptical HIIT Workout" strongly supports the classification as "High-Energy & Intense" due to the use of "All-Out" and "HIIT" in the title and tags, indicating a focus on high-intensity interval training meant to maximize cardiovascular effort in a short time. The description emphasizes the "all-out interval work" which characterizes the intense spirit with a score of 0.9. The repetitive structure of intervals with precise time allocations for effort and rest phases justifies the "Structured & Disciplined" spirit with a score of 0.8. The workout is methodical, suggesting progressive pacing and exact interval timing, which aligns with disciplined and structured workout protocols. User comments adding to the endurance challenge for diverse fitness levels further affirm both spirits. "Flow & Rhythm" or "Soothing & Restorative" were not relevant as the primary aim is to challenge the user with intense efforts and structured intervals rather than relaxation or seamless movement.
